text: Kare-ra izen ni mo nufu no min ya sonogo no hitobito wa,(yogen-sha o) uso-tsuki yobawari shita. Soshite korera (fushinjin) no to wa, kare-ra no yogen-sha ni sakubo shi, kare-ra (shito) o tsukamaete tsumaranai giron o fukikake, shinri o hinan shita. Sokode ware wa kare-ra o toraeta. Waga chobatsu wa nanto ikameshikatta koto yo
